name: Welcome Day 2017
description:
The welcome day is the first event organized by GDG Algiers club at the beginning of each season. During this event, members of the club will come together to give their audience all the information about the group, its reason of being, goals and future prospects. It is an event that pitches the entire journey of GDG Algiers, but also answers the flagship question: why should you join the GDG Algiers family ?

name: Google Developers Roadshow MENA 2017 - Algiers
description:
If you have been waiting for Google in Algeria for a long time, then join us at Google Developers Roadshow, a free Google technology event!

The Google Developers Roadshow MENA 2017 is a series of interactive conferences, providing the latest updates on Google technologies and open platforms for developers and industry leaders. It will be held throughout the year at various cities in Middle East and North Africa.

This will be hosted by Google with multiple Google Developers Experts, and the Google Developers Relations and Ecosystem MENA Region lead attending.

- Agenda and Speakers :Â https://goo.gl/9rBgMi(https://t.co/ZyGtW7qCh0)

- Location: ESI (Ecole Nationale SupÃ©rieure d'Informatique) ex. INI, Oued Smar, Algiers (https://goo.gl/2mtH4a)

- Registration : https://goo.gl/edraurÂ (https://t.co/AHdZxeQ28O)

A confirmation email will be sent by the Google Team once your application details are saved. The final confirmation will be sent shortly before the event.Â Meetup RSVP does not count as registration for this event.

Seating is limited, soÂ apply ASAP!Â

name: Mobile Sites Certification Study Jam 2018 - session 1 ONLINE
description:
• What we'll do
GDG Algiers is organising a study jam on mobile site certification. This is a chance to get a professional accreditation that demonstrates you have an understanding of basic and advanced aspects of mobile website design and development. By learning together we think it’s going to be more fun and more of us are going to be able to complete it.

• Why do it?
There is more traffic to mobile sites than desktop yet most sites don’t provide an effective experience for users. Best practice is changing rapidly so what people may have learned a few years ago may not be up to date. For companies and site owners we see better mobile design leading to significant and measurable improvements in customer acquisition, retention and engagement.

• What to bring
You need basic web development skills to take part and it typically it takes 3-4 hours to run through the course materials, followed by a 90 minute multiple choice exam. You can find more details on the course here. It’s possible to do it entirely online alone, but we’d like to run through it together as a group.

name: Cloud Study Jam 2018 - session 1
description:
• What we'll do
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin?
Join us for our Cloud Study Jam! Together we'll work through three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs, then you will get free access to the next quest so you can finish this series of labs at home to get a Google-hosted badge for your online profile. You will be able to get hands-on experience with Docker, Kubernetes and Scientific Data Processing, which will earn you additional badges.
Join this meetup to get an official Google training, a $70+ value, free of charge!

• What to bring
Bring a laptop (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed.

• Important to know

name: GDD India Extended 2017 - Algiers
description:
Google Developer Days are global events showcasing the latest developer products and platforms from Google to help you quickly develop high quality apps, grow and retain an active user base, and tap into tools to earn more.
If you didn’t get the opportunity to attend GDD India 2017, this is your chance to catch up! GDD India Extended 2017 - Algiers is here!
Hosted by GDG Algiers and sponsored by Google, this local event will take place at ESI, Oued Smar, on Feb 09 to Feb 10, 2018.

To book a seat, register via this link : https://gdd-ext-algiers.firebaseapp.com/registration

For more info, have a look on the Google Developer Days India 2017 website here : https://developers.google.com/events/gdd-india/
And join us on our Facebook event page : https://web.facebook.com/events/545055695850937/

Hash Code is a team programming competition organized by Google for students and industry professionals across Europe, the Middle East, and Africa. You pick your team and programming language, we pick a Google engineering problem for you to solve.

description:
Have you been wondering what GDG Algiers and WTM Algiers are ?
Have you been asking questions about what they do exactly ?
GDG Algiers Roadshow is a series of welcome days at different universities around Algiers City to present GDG and WTM Communities.

name: Google Cloud Next '18 Extended - Algiers
description:
Join us for this year's Next Extended event, where we'll bring together cloud enthusiasts and the developer community to be a part of the Next '18 experience.

This year, we will be diving deep into cloud with technical keynotes, a hands-on TOPIC (Kubernetes, ML, or Google Cloud Certification) lab, and local speakers.

As an attendee, you'll not only be a part of our vibrant cloud community but also receive free access to Qwiklabs (a $55+ value)!

Don't forget to bring a laptop (PC, Mac, or Chromebook), and get ready for the best Next Extended yet!

Make sure to RSVP to receive upcoming information about this event, and visit https://cloudnext.withgoogle.com/ to learn more about Google Cloud Next '18.

name: GDG Algiers Roadshow 2k18 - ESI
description:
Have you been wondering about what GDG Algiers and WTM Algiers are ?
Are you curious about what we do exactly ?
GDG Algiers Roadshow is a series of welcome days at different universities around Algiers City to present GDG and WTM communities.

The final stop of our great Roadshow around Algiers and Boumerdess is back to our two communities spot "Ecole national Superieure d'Informatique- Algiers (ESI)"

name: DevFest Algiers 2018
description:
GDG DevFest Algiers 2018 is our annual all-day developer conference that offers speaker sessions across multiple product areas, codelabs, hackathon and more! GDG DevFest will, at its core, be powered by a shared belief that when developers come together to exchange ideas, amazing things can happen!

DevFest Algiers 2018 is a 100% community organized full-day developer conference featuring awesome world-class speakers from technology leaders within the community as well as Google product team developers. This edition will be kind of special So stay tuned ...

#DevFest #Algiers #DevFestStories
#flutter
#BuildActions
#Firebase
#Android
#GCP
#android_things
#studyjam
#Web #PWA #AMP

name: Flutter Study Jams - DevFest Algiers 2018 -
description:
Come and Learn Flutter for hybrid mobile apps development. Develop your Android and iOS app from one codebase. Fun. Isn't it? Sign Up for our Flutter Study Jam and develop the right skills you based on Udacity's Flutter Course.

Bring a laptop! The course will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers.

Requirements
The laptop should have Flutter installed on it prior to starting the study jam to save time. Windows/Linux/Mac would all be fine. Check out: https://flutter.io/get-started/install/

name: Machine Learning Crash Course Study Jam
description:
Study Jams are a great opportunity to bring members of your community together to learn something new or advance their knowledge, with the help of a community facilitator. Skills learnt in this workshop can be used for personal development or career advancement.
As a complement to large tech talks and viewing party events that you may already be hosting, the Machine Learning Study Jam framework brings together a small group of your members who are interested in learning about Machine Learning.

name: Build Actions for your Community
description:
Actions on Google and Google Assistant are one of the major Google technical areas and we want to invite the whole developer community to learn about creating Actions for the Google Assistant.
“Build Actions for Your Community” is an open and modular event series designed by Google and offered to community organizers worldwide. You can offer opportunities to developers attending your events to learn how to build Actions for the Google Assistant that are useful for their community - whether it's a professional network, interest group, or your hometown. This way, they can build something in an area that they care about or are interested in.

name: GDR Algiers 2018
description:
Google Developer Roadshows are interactive conferences, providing the latest updates on Google technologies and open platforms for developers, startups and industry leaders. Google Developer Roadshows 2018 will be held throughout the year at various cities in MENA. We're excited to share our thoughts on innovative technologies and encourage developers to build the next big mobile, web, cloud or machine learning solutions.

Come and join us as we travel around MENA to help developers build high quality experiences on Google Developer Platform.

*Register Here : https://events.withgoogle.com/googledevelopersroadshow/registrations/new/

name: Flutter Live Viewing party -Algiers-
description: Join us for Flutter Live on December 4th to experience the latest from Flutter, Google’s free and open source SDK for building high-quality native iOS and Android apps from a single codebase. Presented from the Science Museum in London, we are optimizing Flutter Live to reach the largest audience of mobile developers and provide all the rigor and excitement of an in-person experience to our global online audience.

name: GDG Algiers School 2k18
description: GDG School, an event which creates a fun atmosphere for young developers to learn new techs and tools. A gathering of all GDG Algiers members to share their knowledge and skills within the community and a chance to initiate working with new technologies. It's a two-days event of workshops and study jams for GDG members. They meet, learn, train and have fun all together.

name: Qa'ada GDG Session 1 - Start your ML Journey using Jupyter and Colab
description: Qa'ada GDG is a series of small events where GDG members gather and talk about a topic entirely new, in an atmosphere full of fun, sharing knowledge and learning new technologies.

name: Flutter Study Jams 2019 - Session 1
description:
Flutter is Google’s mobile app SDK for crafting high-quality native interfaces on iOS and Android in record time. Flutter works with existing code, is used by developers and organizations around the world, and is free and open source.

In this study jam, we'll go through all the fundamentals of this popular technology while building an app together!

This session will be for absolute beginners, the only requirement is knowing the basics of any OOP language

• What to bring
Bring a laptop with Flutter installed on it prior to starting the study jam. Check out this link for the installation process : https://flutter.io/get-started/install/

name: Flutter Study Jams 2019 - Session 2
description:
Flutter is Google’s mobile app SDK for crafting high-quality native interfaces on iOS and Android in record time. Flutter works with existing code, is used by developers and organizations around the world, and is free and open source.

In this study jam, we'll go through all the fundamentals of this popular technology while building an app together!

• What to bring
Bring a laptop with Flutter installed on it prior to starting the study jam. Check out this link for the installation process : https://flutter.io/get-started/install/

name: GDG Algiers in Breaking Science
description:
GDG Algiers is present in Breaking Science to present many apps made by GDG Algiers organizers or Google such as :

- Android things survey box (Android things + Firebase + Polymer)
- Two Google Homes
- A GDG Algiers bot using DialogFlow
- The quickdraw app made by Google : https://quickdraw.withgoogle.com

name: Machine Learning Study Jams - Session 1
description:
We'll learn together the fundamentals of ML and neural networks, after that we'll implement our own Neural network used in the problem of classification and compare it with a pre-trained model all of that using the TensorFlow library.

TensorFlow is an open source software library for high-performance numerical computation. Its flexible architecture allows easy deployment of computation across a variety of platforms (CPUs, GPUs, TPUs), and from desktops to clusters of servers to mobile and edge devices.

Originally developed by researchers and engineers from the Google Brain team within Google’s AI organization, it comes with strong support for machine learning and deep learning and the flexible numerical computation core is used across many other scientific domains.

We hope to see you there!

name: Hash Code 2019 - GDG Algiers Hub
description:
Hash code 2019 is a Google’s team-based programming competition, Hash code allows you to share your skills and connect with other coders as you work together to solve a problem modeled off a real Google engineering challenge! In small teams of two to four, coders all over the world will tackle the first problem through an Online Qualification Round. Though this round is hosted online, teams can come together to compete side-by-side in locally coordinated Hash Code hubs. The top teams from this round are invited to join an international Google office for the annual Hash Code Final Round.

GDG Algiers will be hosting a hub at Higher National School of Computer Science - Algiers, to give a space and an amazing challenging atmosphere for the teams to meet and compete.

#HashCode #HashCode2019 #GDGAlgiersHub #Google #coding #GDGAlgiers #GDG

name: Machine Learning Study Jams - Session 2
description:

name: IWD'19 Algiers

venue.name: Ecole Nationale SupÃ©rieure d'Informatique (Higher School for Computer Science)

description:
This is a global event proposed by Google as part of the Women Techmakers program. It is a series of conferences and workshops that take place around the world during the month of March to celebrate Women's Day. Through these events Google I wish to highlight the contribution of the work and sacrifices of women leaders in the evolution of the technological field. The goal is to inspire, impress and inspire women to revolutionize the world with technology.
The aim of this year's edition is to give a new vision on today's technologies, to exchange ideas and to evolve Algerian concepts and habits of lean consumption in terms of technologies, all this with back Google products.
It will be an opportunity for the female community of Algerian processors, users and enthusiasts of Google technologies, to meet, train and disseminate around ICT in general, innovations and new products.
